faq.question: What is Sceiba?
faq.answer: It is a repository of Cuban scientific publications. Integra different scientific publication spaces such as Scientific Journals and Institutional Repositories.

faq.question: What can I find in Sceiba?
faq.answer: We collect resources published in Open Access: Scientific articles, Presentations, Research Data.

faq.question: What is your relationship with Tocororo?
faq.answer: It is a computer solution within the Tocororo project, in an effort for scientific communication in Cuba within the National Science, Technology and Innovation Program: Computerization of Society.

about.address: Calle Martí 300 e/ González Alcorta y 27 de noviembre. Pinar del Río.  Código Postal 20100. Pinar del Río, Cuba
about.author: Centro de Recursos para el Aprendizaje y la Información (CRAI)
